module.name: FileReferenceList
module.short: Contains types and classes used to implement a list of file references.

descr.p: Implements the TFileReference and TFileReferenceList classes. Provides a list of file references with reference counters and a search path for files in the list.

element.name: TFileReference
element.short: Represents a reference-counted file stored in TFileReferenceList.

descr.p: TFileReference is a class used to represent a reference-counted file stored in the TFileReferenceList class. It provides FileName and ReferenceCount properties which are maintained by methods in TFileReferenceList.

element.name: TFileReference.Filename
element.short: Contains the name for the reference-counted file in the class instance.

descr.p: FileName is a read-only String property with the name for the reference-counted file. The value in FileName is assigned in the TFileReferenceList.AddFilename method when the class instance is created.
Use ReferenceCount to determine the number of times the file is referenced in the AVL Tree for the TFileReferenceList class where the item is stored.

element.name: TFileReference.ReferenceCount
element.short: Contains the number of references for the file.

element.name: TFileReferenceFlag
element.short: Represents flag values used for file references in TFileReferenceList.

element.name: TFileReferenceFlag.frfSearchPathValid
element.short: Included when the search path for a file reference list is valid.

element.name: TFileReferenceFlag.frfChanged
element.short: Included when the Timestamp or UpdateLock is changed for a file reference list.

element.name: TFileReferenceFlags
element.short: Set type used to store flag values for TFileReferenceList.

element.name: TFileReferenceList
element.short: Implements a list used to maintain TFileReference instances.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.FTree
element.short: Tree of TFileReference instances sorted by file name.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.UpdateSearchPath
element.short: Reconstructs the delimited list of search path(s) for the files in the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.IncreaseTimeStamp
element.short: Increments the value in the TimeStamp property.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.Invalidate
element.short: Updates the TimeStamp and internal flags for the list, and signal OnChange when needed.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Sets the default value for the Timestamp property (LUInvalidChangeStamp64).

element.name: TFileReferenceList.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Destroy is the overridden destructor for the class instance. It calls Clear to remove nodes in the internal AVL Tree for the class instance. Calls the inherited destructor prior to exiting from the method.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.Clear
element.short: Removes any tree nodes in the internal AVL tree.
element.descr: Also frees the TFileReference instance for the AVL tree nodes.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.BeginUpdate
element.short: Increments the UpdateLock for the class instance.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.EndUpdate
element.short: Decrements the UpdateLock and signals OnChange when needed.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.AddFilename
element.short: Adds a reference-counted file name to the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.AddFilename.Filename
element.short: File name added to the list and the internal AVL tree.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.RemoveFilename
element.short: Remove a reference for the specified file name.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.RemoveFilename.Filename
element.short: File name de-referenced in the list and optionally removed from the internal AVL tree.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.GetFileReference
element.short: Gets an existing TFileReference instance for the specified file name.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.GetFileReference.Result
element.short: TFileReference instance for the specified file name, or Nil when not found.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.GetFileReference.Filename
element.short: File name to locate in the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.CreateSearchPathFromAllFiles
element.short: Gets a delimited list of search paths for the reference-counted files in the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.CreateSearchPathFromAllFiles.Result
element.short: Delimited list of search paths for the reference-counted files.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.CreateFileList
element.short: Creates and returns a TStringList instance with the file names in the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.CreateFileList.Result
element.short: TStringList instance allocated in the method for the list of file names.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.TimeStamp
element.short: Contains the timestamp value for the last change to the list.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.OnChanged
element.short: Event handler signalled when items in the list have been changed.

element.name: TFileReferenceList.UpdateLock
element.short: Contains the active update counter for the list.
